data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Diane: Oh, hello! How ____ your ____?
Tracy: Good ____! I'm ____ a ____ day.
Diane: Are ____ going ____ the ____?
Tracy: Yes, I ____ to ____ before ____ is ____. I should say goodbye now.

data.fullContent: Diane: Oh, hello! How is your day? Tracy: Good afternoon! I'm having a great day. Diane: Are you going to the park? Tracy: Yes, I want to go before it is dark. I should say goodbye now.
data.answer: 黛安娜:哦,你好!你今天过得怎么样? 特蕾西:下午好!我今天过得很好。 黛安:你要去公园吗? 特雷西:是的，我想在天黑前走。我该说再见了。
